feed.title: Microjs
feed.subtitle: Fantastic Micro-Frameworks and Micro-Libraries for Fun and Profit!

entry.title: Simplify.js
entry.summary: A tiny high-performance JavaScript 2D/3D polyline simplification library.

entry.title: microevent.js
entry.summary: event emitter for any javascript object for node and browser.

entry.summary: Cross-platform & cross-browser classical inheritance in JavaScript

entry.title: cssFx
entry.summary: Standalone polyfill that inserts the vendor-specific CSS3 properties necessary for old and new browsers.

entry.title: Panzer
entry.summary: A comprehensive node-tree solution, for smart data

entry.title: microcache.js
entry.summary: in-memory cache for node and browser.

entry.title: TinyDOM
entry.summary: A very small DOM manipulation framework

entry.title: one-color
entry.summary: Browser/node color library. Implicit color space conversions, chainable channel methods and CSS convenience methods. RGB, HSV, HSL, CMYK with alpha channel

entry.title: tinyJS
entry.summary: A tiny yet complete toolkit

entry.title: BuildSugar
entry.summary: Bizarrely clean & simple syntax sugar for building HTML/XML strings

entry.title: Lawnchair
entry.summary: Client side JSON document store. Perfect for WebKit mobile apps.

entry.title: mathmethods.js
entry.summary: Give `Number.prototype` the `Math` methods it deserves.

entry.title: Base64.js
entry.summary: `window.btoa` and `window.atob` for browsers which don't provide these functions.

entry.title: String::format
entry.summary: Adds a `format` method to `String.prototype`. Inspired by Python's `str.format()`.

entry.summary: Animation library that uses CSS transforms and transitions to create smooth, hardware-accelerated animations.

entry.title: Ekho
entry.summary: DOM-agnostic event library, with bubbling.

entry.title: Bootstrap
entry.summary: A small, simple bootloader. No frills. Black and white label.

entry.title: Micro-Templating
entry.summary: Templating function that is fast, caches quickly, and is easy to use.

entry.summary: DOM library for authoring HTML5 mobile web applications, works cross-device and cross-platform.

entry.title: JSONSelect
entry.summary: CSS-like selectors for JSON.

entry.title: gowiththeflow.js
entry.summary: Async flow control micro library for node and browser.

entry.summary: A utility-belt that provides functional programming support that you would expect in Ruby.

entry.title: DOMBrew
entry.summary: Clean API high performance DOM builder

entry.title: Slang

entry.title: genData
entry.summary: A normalization pattern to build, query, and manipulate everything.

entry.summary: A publish/subscribe messaging framework

entry.title: Morf
entry.summary: A JavaScript work-around for hardware accelerated CSS3 transitions with custom easing functions.

entry.title: $dom
entry.summary: Selecting, styling, traversing and animating DOM elements.

entry.title: Modernizr
entry.summary: Detects native CSS3 and HTML5 features available in the current browser.

entry.title: Zepto
entry.summary: jQuery API-compatible framework for modern web browsers. Optional Ajax, Events, Data and Touch modules.

entry.title: Weld
entry.summary: Completely unobtrusive, full featured template antimatter. Works in Node.js or the Browser, awesome built-in debugger.

entry.title: Mustache
entry.summary: Minimal, logic-less templating with {{mustaches}}. Great for server- or client-side templating.

entry.title: LABjs
entry.summary: The *performance* script loader: on-demand parallel script loading with ordered execution for dependencies.

entry.title: Qwery
entry.summary: Blazing fast query selector engine allowing you to select elements with CSS1, CSS2 & CSS3 selectors.

entry.title: Jaguar
entry.summary: A lightweight, extensible, and fast selector engine with excellent support for matchesSelector(), commonly used in event delegation. Jaguar supports all CSS1, CSS2, and most CSS3 selectors.

entry.title: Bean
entry.summary: Bean is a slick, cross-platform, framework-agnostic event utility designed for desktop, mobile, and touch-based browsers.

entry.title: $script.js
entry.summary: An asynchronous JavaScript loader and dependency manager with an astonishingly impressive footprint.

entry.title: Klass
entry.summary: An expressive, cross platform JavaScript Class provider with a slick, classical interface to prototypal inheritance.

entry.title: Bonzo
entry.summary: Hassle-free, library agnostic, extensible DOM utility.

entry.title: Classy
entry.summary: Classy is a small JavaScript library that implements Python inspired classes for JavaScript.

entry.title: Director
entry.summary: A lightweight, full featured client side router for single page apps.

entry.title: Reqwest
entry.summary: Robust wrapper for asynchronous http requests.

entry.title: Tempo

entry.title: scaleApp.js

entry.title: Metamorph.js
entry.summary:
Metamorph.js is a library that allows you to create a string of HTML, insert it into the DOM, and update the contents later. It works for normal cases, like inserting text into a

tag, and more complicated cases, like updating an

  • inside a
      or a inside a (even after the was automatically generated). The motivation for the Metamorph library is to make it possible for template engines to insert arbitrary content into a String of outputted HTML that they are generating with the ability to replace exactly that content later.
